branchItem.name: HEB-W, Peltier-Type Thermoelectric Bath (Controller / Tank Combination)
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacity: 140W <LI>Temperature range setting: -15 to 60°C (5 to 60°C for water) <LI>Temperature distribution in bath: ±0.02°C <LI>Power supply requirement: single phase 100 ~ 240 VAC, 50/60Hz <LI>Bath fluid: Clear water or fluorinated liquid <LI>Standards: CE and UL </LI></UL>
